item.title: Unleashing the Power of Docker: Why it Dominates VMs in Modern Cloud Computing
item.category: "Docker" , "Virtual Machines" , "VMs" , "Cloud Computing" , "Containers" , "Simplicity" , "Scalability" , "Security" , "Cost-effectiveness" , "Dockerfile" , "Building, testing and deploying" , "Isolation" , "Security track record" , "Cost comparison" , "Informative article"
item.description: Discover the power of Docker in cloud computing, as it outpaces VMs with its simplicity, scalability, security, and cost-effectiveness, in this article.
